name: Beat Boxers
description: Beat Boxers is the world's first Rhythm-Fighting Game. In order to win, players have to attack to the beat of the music. The closer you hit to the beat, the stronger your attacks. Keep up the rhythm and outplay your opponent!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 x64 Processor: Core 2 Duo E4400 2.0Ghz Graphics: Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3800+ or GeForce GT 520 --- REQUIRES DEDICATED GRAPHICS CARD DirectX: Version 11 Additional Notes: For optimal experience use headphones.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
